TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReturnValueNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ReturnValueNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ReturnValueNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定 Windows 執行階段元件中方法的傳回值名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the return value of a method in a Windows Runtime component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]元件、 方法和傳回值的所有參數都必須有名稱。In a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component, all the parameters of a method and the return value must have names. 根據預設， [Winmdexp.exe （Windows 執行階段中繼資料匯出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool.md)爲傳回值名稱"value"。By default, [Winmdexp.exe (Windows Runtime Metadata Export Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool.md) gives the return value the name "value". 當您使用中的元件[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]撰寫在 JavaScript 中，您可以使用此名稱來擷取傳回值的應用程式。When you use a component in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app written in JavaScript, you can use this name to retrieve the return value. 例如，假設元件定義方法，這個方法具有傳回值和兩個`out`參數 (`ByRef`參數搭配Visual Basic 中的屬性):For example, suppose a component defines a method that has a return value and two `out` parameters (`ByRef` parameters with the attribute in Visual Basic): ```csharp public static int ComputeAverage([ReadOnlyArray()] int[] input, out int minValue, out int maxValue) { … } ``` ```vb Public Shared Function ComputeAverage( _ ByVal input As Integer, _ ByRef minValue As Integer, _ ByRef maxValue As Integer) As Integer … End Function ``` 當您從 JavaScript 呼叫此函式時，您可以依其預設名稱存取傳回的值 (`value`):When you call the function from JavaScript, you can access the return value by its default name (`value`): ```javascript var data = [5, 13, 23, 37]; var results = SampleComponent.TestStuff.computeAverage(data); var formattedResults = "Min=" + results.minValue + ", Avg=" + results.value + ", Max=" + results.maxValue; ``` 您必須為傳回的值提供不同的名稱，如果您已經有名稱為"value"的參數。 或者，您可能只想要使用更有意義的名稱 （例如 「 平均 」 在此範例中）。Or you might simply want to use a more meaningful name (such as "average" in this example). 套用屬性到您的方法，並指定新的名稱。Apply the attribute to your method and specify a new name. ```csharp [return: ReturnValueName("average")] public static int ComputeAverage([ReadOnlyArray()] int[] input, out int minValue, out int maxValue) { … } ``` ```vb Public Shared Function ComputeAverage( _ ByVal input As Integer, _ ByRef minValue As Integer, _ ByRef maxValue As Integer) _ As Integer … End Function ```

related.span: 在 C++ 和 Visual Basic 中建立 Windows 執行階段元件

summary.span: 取得名稱，指定 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 元件中方法的傳回值。

span.span: Gets the name that was specified for the return value of a method in a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component.
The name of the method's return value.
